name: Diamond Discovery
description:
This is my first attempts at both a 2d platformer, and a top-down destination type games

In the 2D:

Use arrow keys to move, Space to jump, P to pause, keypad 0 to shoot(not needed in order to complete levels), E to interact with levers

In the Top-Down:

Use arrow keys to move, Space to shoot, cursor to aim, P to pause and E to interact with doors and buttons
